text: Bumetopia brevicornis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Hiroshi Makihara in 1978. It is known from Japan. It measures between .BioLib.cz - Bumetopia brevicornis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Homonoeini Category:Beetles described in 1978
title: Bumetopia brevicornis
